code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import reducers from'../redux/index';import rootSagas from"../sagas";var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var store=createStore(reducers,compose(applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware),window.devToolsExtension?window.devToolsExtension():function(f){return f;}));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSagas);export default store;
